item.description:
June Monthly Meet Up!

MARGARITAS in Waltham
211 Moody Street, Waltham, MA
(781) 893-9990

http://www.margs.com/...

Hola amigos! Back by popular demand! We've been having such a great turnout and it was so much fun, we've decided to make this a monthly event. And, so folks can find us, I will still bring a balloon even though I looked silly carrying it around the bar while we waited to be seated (and a cute little boy really had his eyes on it).
See ya there!

ps. It is way to hard to make reservations without somewhat of a headcount, so I regret that there will be no MAYBE option this time. If you're coming late, click yes and let us know. Thanks!

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: Boston/Brookline/Burbs Peer-Divorce Support June Meetup
